lyrics:
2 contributorssad story lyricsverse 1
got nothin to say anymore
theres nothin new its all been done before
not looking to settle the scores
so please let me be
thought id be the one youd adore
i always thought i would be so much more
want something that i cant afford
so please let me be
please let me be

chorus
this is the end of a really sad story
dont feel bad for me
i started out alone and in the end thats where ill be
like the start of a really sad story
it dont live happily
i started out alone and in the end thats where ill be

verse 2
got nothin to say anymore
originality went out that door
not finding what im lookin for
so please let me be
please let me be

ill walk alone
